title: JLR is a mainstay of modern motoring luxury, but do car brands need creative figureheads?
description: With Gerry McGovern departing from Jaguar Land Rover, what next for the Indian-owned, British-built house of brands?
content: What does it mean when a design figurehead leaves the company they’ve been associated with for over two decades? Leaving aside rumours of a rather unceremonious dismissal for Professor Gerry McCovern… [+8898 chars]

raw_data.author: Jonathan Bell
